Articles.Content:
I would like to adjust the colors of the lights on my space station. I made the lights a little pink for my taste. since all the ships and assemblies are in an easily-readable text file, is there a way to adjust the rgb values on the space station already in orbit?

thanks

geo

Edited June 24, 2015 by neogeo

Hi neogeo, if you open your persistent.sfs, search for your craft then search for the light, you should see something like this.

MODULE

{

name = ModuleLight

isEnabled = True

isOn = False

lightR = 1

lightG = 1

lightB = 1

Just change those, 0 is off, 0.5 is half brightness and 1 is full brightness for that colour.
